numlitem.para: N1, N2, N3, and Fuel Flow indications on the associated engine are operative,
Associated engine Starter Switch Holding/Cutout Systems are verified to be operative, and
Electronic Engine Control (EEC) Systems are operative.
N1 on the affected engine will not be automatically limited. Deactivate limiter on affected engine.

placard.para: Placard affected ENG Limiter Control Switch "INOP" and enter item in Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Select affected ENG Limiter Switch to OFF.
Verify engine starter switch holding/cutout systems are operative by observing automatic starter cutout at 47% N3.
